title: Bug, chroma packs not working in new champ select
body: Cant pick chroma pack colors in the champ select of update 6.1

replies.body:
Good Morning TurkRevair, 

This is a known issue with champion select - a similar issue occurs with ward skins. We're actively working to resolve this and you should see a fix with Patch 6.2.
So far this has been the case for 3/3 of my games with Darius Forge Chroma Pack. Have you by chance seen any games wherein it has worked? {{champion:122}} {{item:2050}}

Yes! I've seen it in several games. 

I've found a not-so-great, but it works workaround for chroma pack selection. I use the Nami chroma pack frequently and I've found that moving to another skin card and then moving back to the chroma pack and selecting the one I want to use ensures I'm loading in game with the correct chroma. 

Give this a try and let me know if you're having issues still!
Wow that's fair enough paying for it and not able to use this PATCH . seems legit ? how can u say that ur going to fix that next patch  , that's so so bad customer service .

I'm sorry you feel that way. This is something we communicated when the patch first went out, and we knew both chromas and ward skins in champion select were something that wouldn't be available in the new champion select for one patch (still worked in other queues). That said, the new patch is coming out shortly, and this issue will be resolved.

Don't listen to that jagaloon.  You have great customer service and have the most presence here on the boards.  People enjoy holding pitchforks and torches in this community and it is really, really sad.  Keep up the great work!
